casebody.data:
DAVIS
v.
HULSING ENTERPRISES, LLC, et al. 160A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2016

Charles G. Monnett, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For Davis, Thomas A.E. (Jr.), et al.

*216Isaac N. Northup, Jr., Attorney at Law, Katherine M. Pomroy, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Katherine Marie Bulfer, Attorney at Law, For Hulsing Hotels North Carolina, Inc., et al.

Isaac Northup, Attorney at Law.

Lori P. Jones, Attorney at Law, R. Frank Gray, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For N.C. Restaurant and Lodging Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of September 2016 by NC Restaurant and Lodging Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
